ygData.msgSnippet: ZERGLING says yes master, ZERGLING will help ZERGLING grabs one end of the pod. SNIPER starts running down a hill when he sees ZARDUS and ZERGLING grabing

ZERGLING says "yes master, ZERGLING will help" ZERGLING grabs one end 
of the pod.

SNIPER starts running down a hill when he sees ZARDUS and ZERGLING 
grabing the pod. He dives under some bushes and pulls out his rifle. 
He aims it at ZERGLING's side and fires 1 shot

ZERGLING is hit by the bolt and goes falling about 20 yards. He slams 
into a tree. He falls to the ground in pain
